items.sentence: I\'m not going to do anything about that, at least not tonight.
Tom leaned back in his chair and put his hands behind his head.
Tom meets Mary in the school library two or three times a week.
Do you think you could stop insulting me in front of my family?
Do you think your French is good enough to explain the problem?
Do you think Tom would like to go fishing with us next weekend?
I can\'t go ice skating today because I have a lot of homework.
Tom goes to a restaurant for lunch at least three times a week.
How did you know that Tom\'s passport was in the bottom drawer?
How long will it take before Tom realizes he\'s made a mistake?
